title: Zero to Hero
short_cast: Sandra Ng, Louis Cheung, Leung Chung-hang, Fung Ho-yeung, Lo Hoi-pang, Chin Siu-ho, Tony Wu Tsz-tung, Mak Pui-tung, Alan Yueng, Chung Suet-ying

desc: This film based on a true story follows record-breaking Paralympian So Wa-wai and chronicles his bond with his mother.
